meanings.sent2: Oh bejabbers, I forgot my lunch!
meanings.sent3: Bejabbers, I almost spilled my drink!
meanings.sent4: The sudden thunder made me jump, bejabbers!
meanings.sent5: Bejabbers, the magician's trick amazed the audience!

meanings.sent1: I bejabbersed when I stubbed my toe.
meanings.sent2: She bejabbersed loudly when she saw the spider.
meanings.sent3: The child bejabbersed after dropping his ice cream.
meanings.sent4: He bejabbersed in frustration at the broken computer.
meanings.sent5: The pirate bejabbersed as he searched for his lost treasure.
